text: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's Piano Sonata No. 1 in C major, K 279 (189d) (1774) is a sonata in three movements: #Allegro #Andante #Allegro It takes about 14 minutes to play the entire sonata.IMSLP (Piano Sonata No. 1) ==References== Piano Sonata 01 Category:Compositions in C major
title: Piano Sonata No. 1 (Mozart)
